metadata.name: Be Aftab Salami Dobare Khaham Dad
metadata.description:
Be aftab Salami dobare khaham dad” 
was created by Ebrahim Haghighi on 1372 (1993). The physical artwork is serigraphy (silk screen) in 10 versions. On 1393 (2014), The artist recreated the painting in 100X70 cm in 5 spot colors.
This NFT is from the second series.
The sale of each artwork’s corresponding NFT does not grant any copyright or ownership to the physical version of the art to the purchaser.
